description: Substantial Romano-Celtic temple located near Wymondham, Norfolk on undulating ground. Chronology is uncertain.
bibliography: (2021), EAA 175: Crownthorpe: A Boudican Hoard of Bronze Vessels from Early Roman Norfolk
Martyn, Blick, Brindle, et al, (2015), Crownthorpe, Wicklewood (Norfolk), available at: https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449
Clarke, R., (1960), Roman Britain in 1959, Journal of Roman Studies, 50, pg. 228
